OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord radiotherapy field description ( whole abdomen pelvis vs partial abdomen pelvis vs partial abdomen ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive oral ondansetron twice daily oral dexamethasone daily 5-7 day concurrently first 5 fraction radiotherapy . - Arm II : Patients receive oral ondansetron twice daily oral placebo daily 5-7 day concurrently first 5 fraction radiotherapy . Treatment continue arm absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , prior start radiotherapy 5 day since randomization , prior 5th 15th fraction radiotherapy , 1 month completion radiotherapy . Patients follow 1 month .
